text: Happy New Year! As we wrap up 2024, I wanted to take a moment to reflect on the four devices that have truly been my lifelines this year. Without them, I’d be pretty much lost—unproductive, disconnected, and out of touch with the people who matter most. These gadgets are essential parts of my daily life, seamlessly integrating into everything I do. Let’s dive into why these devices are so pivotal for me. Designer: Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max: My Digital Swiss Army Knife Let’s kick things off with the iPhone 16 Pro Max, my all-in-one companion. For most, it’s either Team iPhone or Team Android, but I’m fortunate enough to straddle both camps. My Samsung Galaxy Fold 6 handles the heavy lifting at work, seamlessly managing emails, spreadsheets, and endless meetings. Meanwhile, the iPhone is my ride-or-die personal device, the one I reach for first thing in the morning and last thing at night. It’s practically glued to my hand, a constant presence that keeps me connected no matter where I am. Even when it’s charging on the dock, I’m still tethered to it via iPhone mirroring on my MacBook, ensuring that nothing slips through the cracks. Apple iPhone 16 Pro Why It’s Core to My Life iMessage is the digital glue holding my social circle together. With friends, family, colleagues, and PR contacts all wielding iPhones, it’s the no-brainer choice for staying in touch. When planning a spontaneous weekend getaway, managing work-related travel, sharing updates with my family, or brainstorming with colleagues, iMessage makes communication effortless and reliable. FaceTime is our go-to for check-ins, especially with my girls as they navigate their school days. Those virtual hugs and daily catch-ups keep our bond strong, even when physical distance tries to pull us apart. The camera game on the iPhone has revolutionized how I capture moments. Gone are the days of lugging around a bulky camera for personal snapshots or professional-grade stills and videos. If I’m documenting a scenic hike, creating content for Yanko Design, or capturing candid family moments, the iPhone’s camera system delivers stunning results every time. The ease of switching between modes with the new Camera Control feature means I can adapt quickly to any situation, ensuring I never miss a shot. Why the iPhone 16 Pro Max Matters to Me The iPhone 16 Pro Max is a visual masterpiece with its 6.9-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display. The crisp 2868 x 1320 pixels at 460 ppi make everything from photos to videos pop with incredible detail. ProMotion technology with adaptive refresh rates up to 120Hz ensures scrolling, and animations are buttery smooth, which makes even mundane tasks like browsing social media or reading articles a delightful experience. The Always-On display keeps me updated with notifications and time without constantly waking the device, allowing me to stay informed at a glance. Built with a titanium frame and the latest Ceramic Shield front, this phone is a tank. I’ve had my share of butterfingers moments—accidental drops, slips from my hand—but this device has survived them all without a scratch. The Natural Titanium color I have perfectly complements my style and draws attention with its blend of sophistication and rugged durability. If I’m navigating vibrant city streets or exploring remote landscapes, the iPhone 16 Pro Max stands up to the challenge. Apple iPhone 16 Pro Under the hood, the A18 Pro chipset is an absolute beast. With a 15% faster CPU and a 20% GPU boost compared to last year’s model, multitasking is a breeze. I can effortlessly switch between editing videos in CapCut, managing projects in Asana, and keeping up with my photography in Photos without any lag. High-end mobile gaming runs smoothly, providing a perfect escape during breaks. With storage options up to 1TB, I never worry about running out of space for my extensive photo library, videos, or myriad apps. This capacity also allows me to capture and store RAW photos, ensuring I preserve every detail of my work and memories. Battery life is another area where the iPhone 16 Pro Max shines. I can go a full day of heavy use without breaking a sweat, whether traveling, working, or spending time with family. When I need to charge, the fast charging and wireless capabilities mean I’m never tethered to an outlet for long. Whether in a coffee shop waiting for inspiration to strike or at home winding down, my iPhone is always ready to keep up with my pace. iOS 18 brings many new customization options and features that enhance my daily interactions. I’m particularly excited about the existing and upcoming Apple Intelligence capabilities, which make it feel like we’re on the cusp of a new era in smartphone interaction. To me, Apple Intelligence is pivotal for the company moving forward, but that’s another discussion. The software updates keep my device fresh and aligned with my evolving needs, from more intelligent notifications to enhanced privacy features. In conclusion, the iPhone 16 Pro Max isn’t just a phone—it’s my personal assistant, creative tool, and window to the world. At $1,099, it’s not the cheapest option out there, but it’s worth every penny for what it brings to the table. Stay tuned for my next picks that round out my tech trifecta for 2024! MacBook Air M3 15-inch & MacBook Pro M4 Pro 14-inch: Power Meets Portability Next up are the MacBook Air M3 15-inch and its recently introduced cousin, the MacBook Pro M4 Pro 14-inch. These sleek, portable machines are Apple’s latest and greatest, packing a serious punch in stylish packages that have become indispensable in my daily routine. MacBook Air M3 15-inch: The Big Screen Dream The MacBook Air M3 15-inch is like the cool older sibling of the Air family. It strikes the perfect balance between portability and screen real estate, making you think, “Yeah, I could work on this all day.” If I’m drafting articles, editing images, or watching a movie during a long flight, the expansive 15.3-inch Liquid Retina display is a visual treat. With a native resolution of 2880 x 1864 pixels, 224 pixels per inch (PPI), and 500 nits of brightness, this screen delivers stunning clarity and vibrant colors. Supporting 1 billion colors, the wide color (P3) gamut and True Tone technology ensure every detail looks accurate and lifelike. The larger screen real estate compared to the 14-inch model provides more workspace while maintaining the same pixel density for crisp visuals across the entire display. It’s functional and versatile, allowing me to switch between multiple windows and applications without feeling cramped. At 3.3 pounds, the MacBook Air M3 is still remarkably portable for a 15-inch device. It slides effortlessly into my backpack, ready to accompany me from working on articles in an airplane, catching up on emails at the airport, or sitting inside my Tesla while waiting for the kids at tennis practice. The lightweight design means I can carry it around all day without feeling burdened, making it the perfect companion for work and play. Powered by the M3 chip with an 8-core CPU and a 10-core GPU, this MacBook handles everything from editing 4K videos to juggling 50 Chrome tabs without breaking a sweat. Working on a tight deadline or indulging in some creative brainstorming, the MacBook Air M3 ensures that my workflow remains smooth and uninterrupted. The impressive battery life claimed to be up to 18 hours, means I can go from sunrise to sunset without worrying about finding an outlet, keeping me productive and entertained throughout the day. MacBook Pro M4 Pro 14-inch: The New Kid on the Block This is a dream device with powerful specs and a compact design. The MacBook Pro M4 Pro 14-inch is perfect for any situation that demands peak performance and portability when I need serious performance in a portable package. The M4 Pro chip—featuring a 12-core CPU with eight performance cores and four efficiency cores, alongside a 16-core GPU—easily ensures that this MacBook can handle the most demanding tasks. From rendering complex 3D models to compiling code or streaming high-definition content, the MacBook Pro M4 Pro delivers speed and efficiency that keep up with my fast-paced lifestyle. Despite its smaller 14-inch size, the display is nothing short of impressive. The new nano-texture coating enhances the Liquid Retina XDR display, significantly reducing glare and ensuring clarity in diverse lighting conditions. This feature transforms my workflow, whether I’m editing photos in my sunroom surrounded by windows, preparing reports inside my car during tennis practice, or fine-tuning visuals on an airplane. Supporting vibrant colors and deep blacks, the display’s ProMotion technology ensures every scroll and animation is buttery smooth, making it equally suited for productivity and entertainment. Its 120Hz refresh rate and anti-glare technology ensure that even under direct sunlight or harsh reflections, I can easily focus on the task at hand. Apple has listened to the pros by adding three Thunderbolt 5 ports, HDMI, and an SD card slot, making connectivity a breeze. These ports are a game-changer for media mavens like me, allowing easy transfers of large files, seamless connections to external displays, and effortless integration with my other devices. Including HDMI and an SD card slot eliminates the need for multiple adapters, streamlining my workflow and making my setup more efficient. Battery life on the MacBook Pro M4 Pro is another standout feature, offering up to 22 hours of video playback. In real-world terms, this means I can work, create, and entertain myself for nearly two full days without needing to recharge. Whether traveling for work or enjoying a weekend getaway, the MacBook Pro M4 Pro ensures that I stay connected and productive no matter where I am. Why These Devices Define My Workflow The MacBook Air M3 15-inch has become my reliable partner for tackling detailed work sessions and creative projects. Its lightweight design and expansive screen make it ideal for writing articles, editing visuals, or brainstorming new ideas. Meanwhile, the MacBook Pro M4 Pro 14-inch handles the heavy lifting, stepping in when I face tight deadlines or need to manage complex, multitasking assignments. These devices help me get things done and transform how I work. They enhance my focus and enable me to bring my ideas to life seamlessly. Planning my next big article or taking a well-earned break with a movie, they integrate perfectly into my day-to-day activities. More than tools, these MacBooks are essential to how I create, connect, and stay productive every single day. Apple Watch Ultra 2 and Series 10 Titanium: A New Era in Wearable Tech The Apple Watch Ultra 2 and Series 10 Titanium represent Apple’s bold evolution in wearable technology. The Ultra 2 refines everything great about the original Ultra. Its 3000-nit display is bright enough to handle direct sunlight, perfect for outdoor adventures or early morning runs. The new S9 chip delivers faster performance, enabling smoother interactions and improved responsiveness. Features like the new double-tap gesture make controlling the watch intuitive, even during activities that keep my hands occupied. Apple Watch Ultra 2 vs. Apple Watch Series 10 (Titanium) vs. Apple Watch Series 10 (Aluminum) Battery life, extending up to 72 hours in low-power mode, is critical for my lifestyle. Whether I’m on extended trips, navigating back-to-back workdays, or ensuring fitness tracking continuity, it’s a feature I rely on without hesitation. Its rugged design and water resistance make it a dependable companion for adventures ranging from hiking to diving, ensuring it’s ready for anything. The Series 10 Titanium shifts the focus toward elegance without sacrificing functionality. With a 10% thinner profile, it transforms the wearing experience, sitting comfortably on my wrist throughout workouts and formal events alike. While this reduction might seem minimal, it creates a noticeable difference in how naturally the watch rests, offering unparalleled comfort for extended wear. Both models deliver Apple’s robust suite of health metrics, from heart rate monitoring to advanced sleep tracking, pivotal to maintaining my well-being. These tools allow me to balance a demanding schedule while keeping wellness goals in check. I depend on features like stress monitoring, temperature sensing, and tailored workout adjustments to stay informed and proactive about my health. These watches have become essential in tracking the metrics that matter most to me, ensuring I stay connected to my health while managing a busy life. For a detailed breakdown of these devices and why they’re indispensable to my routine, I invite you to read my full review here on Yanko Design. Apple’s decision to introduce the Ultra 2 and Series 10 Titanium instead of updating the original Ultra represents a strategic move to address diverse needs in the smartwatch market. The Ultra 2 pushes the limits with enhanced durability and advanced features, making it the ultimate outdoor companion for adventurers, athletes, and those who demand top-tier performance. Its brighter display, improved battery life, and cutting-edge technology ensure it performs seamlessly in the harshest conditions. In contrast, the Series 10 Titanium balances style and functionality. Its 10% thinner design transforms the wearing experience, resting flatter on the wrist for enhanced comfort. While the thinner profile might seem minor, the difference is noticeable during high-intensity workouts or daily wear. With features like water depth and temperature sensing borrowed from the Ultra, it’s ideal for professionals who need a watch that transitions effortlessly between the gym, office, and beyond. The polished titanium finish adds durability and sophistication, ensuring it’s as versatile as it is elegant. Both models cater to unique lifestyles but share a common strength: delivering advanced health metrics that are key to tracking fitness goals and overall well-being. These features are pivotal to my routine, whether I’m monitoring activity levels, managing stress, or planning a healthier lifestyle. I invite you to read my full review here on Yanko Design for a detailed breakdown of these devices and why they matter. Apple AirPods Pro 2: The Soundtrack to My Life Last but certainly not least, let’s talk about the Apple AirPods Pro 2. These wireless earbuds are an essential tech accessory—they’re my constant companion at work, during travel, and even in moments of downtime. With low to mild hearing loss and tinnitus, the AirPods Pro 2’s groundbreaking over-the-counter hearing aid features alone are enough reason for me to have a couple of sets on hand. They’ve become integral to my daily routine, enhancing every moment with exceptional sound quality and seamless functionality. They’re so important to me that I actually own three pairs: two AirPods Pro 2 and the new AirPods 4 ANC, ensuring I’m always prepared for any situation. AirPods Pro 2 vs AirPods 4 + ANC The AirPods Pro 2 comes equipped with a custom high-excursion Apple driver and a custom high-dynamic range amplifier, delivering crisp, high-definition sound that makes my favorite tunes sound better than ever. Jamming out while mowing the lawn, immersing myself in a podcast during a long drive, or catching every word of dialogue on a flight—these buds provide an unparalleled audio experience. The rich, detailed soundscape they create makes every listening session enjoyable, no matter where I am or what I’m doing. Noisy plane engines or busy city streets used to be distractions. The AirPods Pro 2 features pro-level active noise cancellation, up to 2x quieter than its predecessor. This makes flights more peaceful, commutes less stressful, and work-from-home days free from interruptions. The Adaptive Transparency mode seamlessly adjusts to let in important sounds, whether I’m waiting for announcements at the airport or walking through the neighborhood. Long days or extended trips are no match for the AirPods Pro 2. They offer up to 6 hours of listening time on a single charge and up to 30 hours total with the charging case. If I’m in a pinch, just 5 minutes of charging provides an hour of use—a lifesaver during busy schedules or when I forget to charge them overnight. The touch controls are intuitive and make everyday tasks effortless. Adjusting the volume with a quick swipe or switching between modes with a press feels natural. The “Hey Siri” functionality is a bonus for hands-free tasks, whether I’m working in the kitchen, carrying luggage, or multitasking at my desk. They’re tools that adapt to how I live and work, ensuring I stay focused and productive. Four ear tip sizes (including XS) ensure a perfect fit for hours of comfort, whether I’m on a domestic flight or tackling a long day of meetings. Built with sweat and water resistance (IPX4 rated), these earbuds handle everything from workouts to sudden rain showers without missing a beat. Apple’s AirPods Pro 2 have introduced groundbreaking hearing health features, transforming them into a comprehensive hearing assistance device. The AirPods Pro 2 now offers a clinical-grade hearing aid feature designed for those with perceived mild to moderate hearing loss. After completing a clinically validated hearing test, they personalize the listening experience by boosting specific sounds like speech or environmental elements. This real-time adjustment includes fine-tuning settings such as amplification, balance, and tone. These features make them effective across various environments, whether at home, in a bustling city, or during a meeting. The hearing test itself is quick, taking about 5 minutes to complete. It uses pure-tone audiometry to play a series of tones at different frequencies and volumes. The results are comparable to professional audiograms, offering a reliable way to assess hearing health from home. In addition to aiding hearing, the AirPods Pro 2 incorporate active Hearing Protection, shielding users from exposure to potentially harmful noise levels. Whether commuting, working in loud environments, or simply enjoying outdoor activities, this feature minimizes risks while maintaining the clarity and dynamic range of audio. The integration with the Apple ecosystem further enhances usability. Setting adjustments are seamless across iPhone, iPad, and Mac, and quick access is provided through the Control Center and the Health app for tracking and managing hearing test results. These features, combined with advanced customization options like Conversation Boost and ambient noise reduction, make the AirPods Pro 2 indispensable for me. Whether I’m monitoring health metrics, managing tinnitus, or enjoying crystal-clear audio on the go, these earbuds are a testament to Apple’s commitment to accessibility and innovation. The AirPods Pro 2 is like having a personal sound engineer, hearing aid, and battery wizard packed into a compact design. Whether tackling a to-do list, jetting off to new destinations, or enjoying quiet moments at home, they keep me connected, comfortable, and immersed in exceptional sound. They’re indispensable to my life and work. Goodbye 2024, I Bid You Farewell! As we wrap up 2024, it’s clear that these four Apple devices— the iPhone 16 Pro Max, MacBook Air M3 15-inch, MacBook Pro M4 Pro 14-inch, Apple Watch Ultra 2 and Series 10 Titanium, and AirPods Pro 2—have been indispensable in enhancing my productivity, connectivity, and overall lifestyle. Each device seamlessly integrates into my daily routine, from the versatile capabilities of the iPhone and the powerful performance of the MacBook to the health and convenience offered by the Apple Watches and the immersive audio experience of the AirPods. Together, they have streamlined my work and personal life and kept me connected and healthy in ways I couldn’t have imagined without them. I’d love to hear from you—what devices have been most important to you in 2024? How have they impacted your life, and what new technologies are you excited about for 2025? Share your favorite gadgets and tech aspirations for the coming year in the comments below or on social media. Let’s celebrate the technology that has kept us connected and look forward to the innovations that will shape our lives in the new year!

Noisy plane engines or busy city streets used to be distractions. The AirPods Pro 2 features pro-level active noise cancellation, up to 2x quieter than its predecessor. This makes flights more peaceful, commutes less stressful, and work-from-home days free from interruptions. The Adaptive Transparency mode seamlessly adjusts to let in important sounds, whether I’m waiting for announcements at the airport or walking through the neighborhood.

Long days or extended trips are no match for the AirPods Pro 2. They offer up to 6 hours of listening time on a single charge and up to 30 hours total with the charging case. If I’m in a pinch, just 5 minutes of charging provides an hour of use—a lifesaver during busy schedules or when I forget to charge them overnight.

The touch controls are intuitive and make everyday tasks effortless. Adjusting the volume with a quick swipe or switching between modes with a press feels natural. The “Hey Siri” functionality is a bonus for hands-free tasks, whether I’m working in the kitchen, carrying luggage, or multitasking at my desk. They’re tools that adapt to how I live and work, ensuring I stay focused and productive.

Four ear tip sizes (including XS) ensure a perfect fit for hours of comfort, whether I’m on a domestic flight or tackling a long day of meetings. Built with sweat and water resistance (IPX4 rated), these earbuds handle everything from workouts to sudden rain showers without missing a beat.

Apple’s AirPods Pro 2 have introduced groundbreaking hearing health features, transforming them into a comprehensive hearing assistance device.

The AirPods Pro 2 now offers a clinical-grade hearing aid feature designed for those with perceived mild to moderate hearing loss. After completing a clinically validated hearing test, they personalize the listening experience by boosting specific sounds like speech or environmental elements. This real-time adjustment includes fine-tuning settings such as amplification, balance, and tone. These features make them effective across various environments, whether at home, in a bustling city, or during a meeting.

The hearing test itself is quick, taking about 5 minutes to complete. It uses pure-tone audiometry to play a series of tones at different frequencies and volumes. The results are comparable to professional audiograms, offering a reliable way to assess hearing health from home.

In addition to aiding hearing, the AirPods Pro 2 incorporate active Hearing Protection, shielding users from exposure to potentially harmful noise levels. Whether commuting, working in loud environments, or simply enjoying outdoor activities, this feature minimizes risks while maintaining the clarity and dynamic range of audio.

The integration with the Apple ecosystem further enhances usability. Setting adjustments are seamless across iPhone, iPad, and Mac, and quick access is provided through the Control Center and the Health app for tracking and managing hearing test results.

These features, combined with advanced customization options like Conversation Boost and ambient noise reduction, make the AirPods Pro 2 indispensable for me. Whether I’m monitoring health metrics, managing tinnitus, or enjoying crystal-clear audio on the go, these earbuds are a testament to Apple’s commitment to accessibility and innovation.

The AirPods Pro 2 is like having a personal sound engineer, hearing aid, and battery wizard packed into a compact design. Whether tackling a to-do list, jetting off to new destinations, or enjoying quiet moments at home, they keep me connected, comfortable, and immersed in exceptional sound. They’re indispensable to my life and work.
